arts.ttl: Pulisic lights up Milan derby, Haaland reaches 100 goals
arts.sum: After registering six wins in their first six league games, Barça have a four-point lead at the top of the table, clear of a Real Madrid side who had to come from behind to beat Espanyol 4-1 on Saturday thanks to the impact of Vinícius Junior off the bench in the second half. In Germany, VfB Stuttgart thrashed Borussia Dortmund 5-1, increasing pressure on new coach Nuri Sahin, while Schalke 04 sacked yet another manager after a poor start in the German second division.

arts.ttl: Podcast: At the Games – Milan Derby, Inter 1-2 AC Milan
arts.sum: This 2024/25 Serie A season is already full of surprises, and AC Milan claiming a 2-1 win over Inter in the season’s first Derby della Madonnina on Matchday 5 definitely goes down as one of those. Our At the Games series takes you along with us. We had Conor Clancy at the Stadio Giuseppe Meazza […] The post Podcast: At the Games – Milan Derby, Inter 1-2 AC Milan appeared first on Total Italian Football.

arts.ttl: Pulisic scores as AC Milan beat Inter in derby
arts.sum: AC Milan secured a hard-fought 2-1 victory over Inter Milan in Serie A on Sunday with Matteo Gabbia heading home the winner in the closing minutes of the match.

arts.ttl: Inter vs Milan 1-2: Gabbia Breaks Derby Losing Streak
arts.sum: The verdict of the first Derby di Milano of the season certified Milan's surprising redemption as the Rossoneri came back to winning ways in a stracittadina after six losses in a row. Goals from Christian Pulisic (another early scoring for the US soccer stalwart!) and Matteo Gabbia finally broke the curse for the red-and-black side of Milano, while Federico Dimarco's equalizer only gave a temporary relief to Simone Inzaghi's side. The post Inter vs Milan 1-2: Gabbia Breaks Derby Losing Streak appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
